title: 【內有教學】有轉話謝振中準備移民，麻煩大家一齊上美國移民report佢，等佢留係大灣區為市民服務

我地點都要叫美國割愛讓返佢比大灣區

好喇以下開放比大家一齊黎report
唔止謝Sir，你身邊任何一個想移民美國既黑警都適用咖

https://hk.usconsulate.gov/zhhk/visas-zh/visa-report-fraud-zh/
領事部歡迎你舉報有關不法使用美國護照, 不法使用簽證, 不誠實的申請, 及任何其他與護照或簽證有關的不法行為。

狗名：謝振中 TSE CHUN CHUNG JOHN
狗隊編號：623
老豆搵仔編號：#A325
地址：太古康怡花園J座20樓08室
身分證：K578848A

蓋括描述有關簽證或護照不恰當行為 (以五佰字為上限)
(下面係Sample，打唔到太多字所以我用左Amnesty International既文去解釋)
TSE CHUN CHUNG is a police offer who is involved in excessive use of force during the past few months of the Hong Kong protests, including alleged torture and other ill-treatment in detention. For details of police brutality, you may refer to the report of Amnesty International (https://bit.ly/2AHf6TL). His wife is now trying to get American citizenship and it would be extremely unsafe for the US to take him in, someone who will threaten the human right of any individual.

replies.msg:
直接去美國移民局REPORT
https://www.uscis.gov/report-fraud

Combating Fraud and Abuse in Other Immigration Benefit Programs

To make it as easy as possible to report suspected immigration benefit fraud and abuse (excluding the H-1B and H-2B programs), we have established an email address dedicated to receiving information.

Email reportfraudtips@uscis.dhs.gov with tips, alleged violations, and other relevant information about potential fraud and abuse. Be sure to include as much information as possible, including:

The subject’s full name, date and place of birth, and country of citizenship (if known)
A description of the alleged violation, abuse, or suspected fraud
Any numeric identifiers such as alien numbers (A-Numbers) or receipt numbers
Any other information that may be useful to investigate the alleged fraud or abuse

Combating Fraud and Abuse in Other Immigration Benefit Programs

To make it as easy as possible to report suspected immigration benefit fraud and abuse (excluding the H-1B and H-2B programs), we have established an email address dedicated to receiving information.

Email reportfraudtips@uscis.dhs.gov with tips, alleged violations, and other relevant information about potential fraud and abuse. Be sure to include as much information as possible, including:

The subject’s full name, date and place of birth, and country of citizenship (if known)
A description of the alleged violation, abuse, or suspected fraud
Any numeric identifiers such as alien numbers (A-Numbers) or receipt numbers
Any other information that may be useful to investigate the alleged fraud or abuse

Email 都有template




快啲Email 俾美國移民局📣📣

Send 曬俾三個email。記得加埋相👇🏻

public.engagement@uscis.dhs.gov
publicengagementfeedback@uscis.dhs.gov
Reportfraudtips@uscis.dhs.gov

Email 主旨: Chun Chung Tse’s US Citizenship Application

Dear Sir or Madam,

I am writing to bring to your attention that Mr. Chun Chung John Tse may be attempting to migrate to the United States. This person is the commander of the Hong Kong Police Public Relations Branch. He has appeared at numerous press conference in Hong Kong speaking on behalf of the Hong Kong Police in regards to the ongoing protests where Hong Kong people are fighting for freedom. As you may be aware already, since June this year, the Hong Kong Police have been making unjust arrests of the protestors, abusing their power, violating human rights, wrongly accusing the protestors and releasing false information to the public. They are of evil nature and cannot be trusted by the Hong Kong people.

Under the U.S. Immigration and Nationality Act Section 212(a)(2)(G), foreign government officials and their immediate family members, who are responsible for, or have carried out particularly severe violations of human rights, are inadmissible for entry into the United States.

I believe that Mr. Tse’s wife, Sirvin Lee, has already obtained a green card. I kindly urge the United States to revoke this family’s green cards and visas and deny their entry to the United States.

Attached are their photos.

Thank you for your attention in this matter.

Regards,
A Hong Kong Citizen
